<rules> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>Current Value</source> <value id="1">High</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Image</target> <value>Battery/battery_green.png</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>Current Value</source> <value id="1">Medium-High</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Image</target> <value>Battery/battery_yellow.png</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>Current Value</source> <value id="1">Medium-Low</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Image</target> <value>Battery/battery_orange.png</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>Current Value</source> <value id="1">Low</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Image</target> <value>Battery/battery_red.png</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>Current Value</source> <value id="1">Unknown</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Image</target> <value>Battery/battery_purple.png</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>Current Value</source> <value id="1">N/A</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Image</target> <value>Battery/battery_gray.png</value> </action> </actions> </rule> </rules>

The theme is designed around having a quad core PC with 2 graphics cards but is easily customizable.
If you want to use CoreTemp instead of SpeedFan, select each of the Text items under the "Cores" section and change their "class" to "LH_Monitoring/CoreTempText". Then change the status images to "LH_Monitoring/CoreTempStatusImage".

Similarly, to convert this theme from using MSI Afterburner to using RivaTuner or GPU-Z to monitor your graphics card(s) select the items under the GPUs heading and change them accordingly.

[Eos Layout]
This layout is by Triscopic, but uses the following resources:
  • "Eos" background by elusive @ DeviantArt.
  • "Silk" icons by famfamfam.com.
  • Weather Images by Yahoo!
The main change you need to make to this layout is to change the location. Simply Select the "Weather Data" object (right) and type your location into the Location box. You may also want to change the threshold temperatures (the values set here work for me, but I do not guarentee them for anyone else!)
